name: Hero Bump
description:
Pinball Universe:
Have you ever wondered what it's like inside the world of a Pinball Cabinet?
Start your journey to the Pinball Universe, a world full of fantasy civilizations and pinball-like heroes.
The chubby heroes of the Pinball Universe bump and battle with each other constantly.
Their fierce arena battles generate the energy that powers the Pinball Universe.
Each hero has a unique skill that improves their odds to prevail in battle. They also varies depending on their size, speed, and weight.
Lead your heroes to bump in battles and conquer arenas now!

Intro:
Join real-time PvP battles and recruit legendary heroes in Hero Bump. Enjoy the easy-to-master gameplay and unleash the fun at your fingertips! Experience the realistic pool dynamics and make magical trick shots. Utilize the card collectible system and improve your decks over time. Battle it out with your friends anytime and anywhere!

GAME FEATURES:
- Various Game Modes
Duel, King's Fall, and more... Discover various game modes to play! Prepare diverse decks for all types of challenges.

- Score Insane Combos
The free-to-play and easy-to-master gameplay allow you to employ various strategies. Make magical trick shots to score insane combos and claim triumphant victory!

- Strategic Deck Building
Test out strategies and discover new METAs! Build your own decks and bump your way to the top of the ranks!

- Challenging Puzzle Solving
Prove your wit in PvE Chapters. Solve physics-based puzzles and earn exclusive rewards.

- Team Up with Your Guild
Join or create your guild. Meet your guildmates, share the fun, and support each other. Guildmates can donate cards to each other!

- Share Your Highlights
All your hyped combos and highlights can be saved as shareable playback clips. Challenge your friends and battle it out now!

- Live Voice Chat
- Bump and chat in bouts with players from all around the world!
